sentences.english: Will this new program attract skilled personnel to our company?
sentences.chinese: 这个新项目将能吸引有技术的全体人员到我们共司敬？

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合。

sentences.english: But he said no one at the dinner was ever in danger.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他表示晚宴全体人员人身安全均未受到威胁。

sentences.english: Modern Family won for overall cast performance in a TV comedy.
sentences.chinese: 《摩登家庭》的全体人员获得了最佳喜剧表演奖。

sentences.english: The general issued an order to capture the hill to all personnel.
sentences.chinese: 将军向全体人员下达占领那座山的命令。

sentences.english: If the fire-alarm goes, staff should assemble outside building.
sentences.chinese: 火景警报响时全体人员缨到楼外集合。

sentences.english: All personnel working for SECCO project are governed by this procedure.
sentences.chinese: 参与赛科项目建设的全体人员均受本条例的约束。

sentences.english: After the opening ceremony and all staff visit a memorial, to pay homage dead miners.
sentences.chinese: 揭牌仪式后，全体人员参观纪念馆，凭吊死难矿工。

sentences.english: Every person from the team was invited to have a great dinner by this Scottish family.
sentences.chinese: 热情好客的苏格兰人在家中盛情款待我队全体人员。

definition: to tackle a thorny problem and overcome its challenges
group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
to coordinate closely/to act in close partnership with
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
